title: Ep119: 2nd Fife & Forfar Yeomanry - New Beginnings
itunes:title: Ep119: 2nd Fife & Forfar Yeomanry - New Beginnings
description:
Pete and Gary's much-loved special series are back! Having told the story of the gunners with the South Notts Hussars and the infantry with the the 2nd Royal Norfolk Regiment, it's now the 'Tankies' turn! Follow the story of this Second World War armoured regiment throughout the war.


Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain

Publisher: Mat McLachlan

Producer: Jess Stebnicki


Become a member to listen ad-free for only £2 per month: https://plus.acast.com/s/pete-and-garys-military-history
